alert.note: Alert for Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 21 at 9:55PM CST until February 22 at 4:00AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN CALLAHAN...NORTHWESTERN COLEMAN...SOUTHEASTERN TAYLOR AND NORTHEASTERN RUNNELS COUNTIES... At 955 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winters, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Winters, Lawn, Novice, Hatchel, Silver Valley, Crews, Glen Cove, Oplin, Goldsboro, Lake Winters Lake, Lake Coleman and Pumphrey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
